name: beganto Incorporation
overview:
Since pioneering the Need-A-SampleÂ® application in 2003, Beganto provides powerful web-based applications and support services that enable part manufacturers and distributors to capture Electronic Component sample opportunities and track them to their logical conclusion anywhere in the world.

Beganto’s patent pending technology powers the Beganto Open Network. Also known as BeON, it is the global electronics industryâ€™s largest online network that has customers, suppliers, reps and distributors all on the same software platform.

Customers (engineers, program managers and buyers from electronics OEMs) use BeON to sample, source and track parts for their projects.

Part manufacturers and their authorized distributors advertise the parts they sell to generate leads and track new business opportunities as they progress through the design, procurement and manufacturing phase.

Beganto operates BeON and provides outsourced services to improve productivity, increase revenues and reduce costs. Read case studies to see how Beganto has delivered quantifiable value for its clients.
